#
# NOTE: THIS FILE HAS HAND MODIFICATIONS !!! 
#
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(MOAB_database)

INCLUDE(${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMake/PluginMacros.cmake)

#
# NOTE: THIS FILE HAS HAND MODIFICATIONS !!! 
# Skip adding Code Gen Targets
# ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(MOAB)
#

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
MOABPluginInfo.C
MOABCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
MOABPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
MOABMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtMOABFileFormat.C
avtMOABOptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
MOABEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtMOABFileFormat.C
avtMOABWriter.C
avtMOABOptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${MOAB_INCLUDE_DIR}
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR}
${MOAB_MPI_INCLUDE_DIR}
${HDF5_MPI_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${MOAB_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR})

ADD_LIBRARY(IMOABDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IMOABDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IMOABDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MMOABDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MMOABDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${MOAB_LIB} ${HDF5_LIB})
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MMOABDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MMOABDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EMOABDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EMOABDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser ${MOAB_LIB} ${HDF5_LIB})
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EMOABDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EMOABDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${MOAB_MPI_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_MPI_LIBRARY_DIR})
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EMOABDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EMOABDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par ${MOAB_MPI_LIB} ${HDF5_MPI_LIB})
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EMOABDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EMOABDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases MOAB ${INSTALLTARGETS})
